mapper.insert:
insert into cd_key_detail (cd_key_id, code, exchange_status, status) values
(#{data.cdKeyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{data.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data.exchangeStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{data.status,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update cd_key_detail set cd_key_id = #{cdKeyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, exchange_status = #{exchangeStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_update = #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, cd_key_id, code, exchange_status, status, gmt_create, gmt_update from cd_key_detail
